card_usp: Unlimited Domestic & International Airport Lounge Access for both you and your loved ones, the primary and add-on cardholders.
annual_fee_waiver: Annual fee waived on spends of INR 10 Lakhs in the preceding year.
fuel_transaction_fee: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on transactions between INR 500 and INR 10,000
rewards_program: Earn up to 3 reward points for every ₹100 spent.
spend_based_reversal: Annual fee reversed if spends > ₹1 lakh/year.
rewards: 2 complimentary movie tickets every month, 3 complimentary non-movie tickets every quarter.
features: Complimentary Taj Epicure Preferred Membership or Club ITC Culinaire Select Membership, Unlimited domestic golf games and lessons, 4 international golf games complimentary every year.
welcome_benefit: 6000 Bonus Reward Points on spends of ₹1 lakh within the first 30 days.
milestone_benefit: Taj experiences gift certificate worth ₹1 lakh on spends of ₹75 Lakhs within an anniversary year.
movie_benefits: 2 complimentary movie tickets in a month.
stay_benefits: One complimentary night stay at select participating Taj hotels.
lounge_access: Unlimited Domestic & International Airport Lounge Access for both you and your loved ones, the primary and add-on cardholders.
insurance: Overseas health insurance up to USD 25,000, Air Accident Cover, International Travel Insurance.
